attributes.action: request the Minister for Schools to extend the consultation period on reorganisation of Secondary and Special schools in Stoke on Trent to allow a full, meaningful and inclusive debate about the requirements of the present and future students.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As the consultation period had already started at least one week before the details were known by the majority of the interested parties and with the intrusion of the Christmas holidays it is only equable that additional time is allowed for serious debate about this reorganisation.
